verses.name: Ezekiel 39:1
verses.text: Therefore, thou son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:2
verses.text: And I will turn thee back, and leave but the sixth part of thee, and will cause thee to come up from the north parts, and will bring thee upon the mountains of Israel:

verses.name: Ezekiel 39:3
verses.text: And I will smite thy bow out of thy left hand, and will cause thine arrows to fall out of thy right hand.
